sourcesContent:
<template>
  <c-dynamic-form
    ref="elForm"
    :form-data="formData"
    :form-items="formItems"
    :form-attrs="formAttrs"
    @change-model="(model, value, field) => onChangeModel(model, value, field)"
  >
    <template slot="custom|content" slot-scope="{ data }">
      <wang-edit v-model="data.content"></wang-edit>
    </template>
  </c-dynamic-form>
</template>

<script>
import { Button, FormItem } from 'element-ui';
import CDynamicForm from '@/components/common/CDynamicForm/index';
import wangEdit from '@/pages/sims/components/common/CWangEdit';
import { regenFormItems } from '../utils/business-form';
import businessFormMixin from '../../../mixins/business-form-mixin';

export default {
  name: 'BHelpDocumentDetail',
  mixins: [businessFormMixin],
  components: {
    [Button.name]: Button,
    [FormItem.name]: FormItem,
    CDynamicForm,
    wangEdit
  },
  props: {},
  data() {
    return {
      //弹窗表单默认值（编辑时传入）
      formData: {},
      formAttrs: {
        'label-position': 'right',
        'label-width': '110px'
      }
    };
  },
  computed: {
    formItems() {
      let items = [
        {
          type: 'input',
          prop: 'title',
          label: '标题：',
          attrs: {
            maxlength: 30
          },
          rules: [
            {
              required: true,
              trigger: 'blur',
              message: '标题未填写'
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          type: 'custom',
          slotName: 'content',
          prop: 'content',
          label: '正文：',
          rules: [
            {
              required: true,
              trigger: 'blur',
              message: '正文未填写'
            }
          ]
        },
        {
          type: 'radio',
          prop: 'documentType',
          label: '文章分类：',
          rules: [
            {
              required: true,
              trigger: 'change',
              message: '文章分类未填写'
            }
          ],
          options: this.$D('documentType')
        }
      ];
      return regenFormItems(items, this.options, {
        disabled: this.disabled,
        readonly: this.readonly
      });
    }
  },
  watch: {
    model: {
      immediate: true,
      handler: 'changeData',
      deep: true
    }
  },
  created() {},
  mounted() {},
  methods: {
    /**
     * 表单更新formData
     * @param {Object} model 更新后的表单数据
     * @param {Object} formData 当前需要更新的表单数据
     */
    onChangeModel(model, value, field) {
      this.formData = model;
      this.$emit('change-model', model, value, field);
    },
    /**
     * 数据更新
     */
    changeData() {
      // Object.assign(this.formData, { ...this.model });
      this.formData = this.model;
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style lang="less" scoped></style>
